from zExceptions import Unauthorized
 if REQUEST is not None:
 raise Unauthorized
 
 from DateTime import DateTime
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 result = []
 
 if not context.HostingSubscription_isFreeHosted():
 
 # XXX TODO: serialize probably missing
 # hosting_subscription.serialise()
 
 sale_trade_condition = context.sale_trade_condition.slapos_hosting_business_process
 specialise_reference = sale_trade_condition.getReference()
 
 service = context.service_module.slapos_instance_hosting
 person = context.getDestinationSectionValue(portal_type="Person")
 
 kw = dict(
 portal_type='Sale Packing List Line',
 default_resource_uid=service.getUid(), 
 default_aggregate_uid=context.getUid(),
 parent_specialise_reference=specialise_reference,
 parent_specialise_portal_type="Sale Trade Condition",
 parent_destination_section=person.getRelativeUrl(),
 )
 
 delivery_line = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(sort_on=(("movement.stop_date",'descending'),),
 simulation_state=["started", "stopped"],**kw)
 
 if delivery_line is None:
 start_date = context.HostingSubscription_calculateSubscriptionStartDate()
 else:
 start_date = delivery_line.getStopDate()
 
 stop_date = DateTime().earliestTime() 
 
 consumed_day_amount = int(stop_date-start_date)
 if consumed_day_amount < 1:
 return "We don't create consumption per smaller them 1"
 
 delivery_template = portal.restrictedTraverse(
 portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredInstanceDeliveryTemplate())
 
 delivery = delivery_template.Base_createCloneDocument(batch_mode=1)
 
 delivery.edit(
 title="%s Daily Hosting" % context.getReference(),
 destination=person.getRelativeUrl(),
 destination_decision=person.getRelativeUrl(),
 destination_section=person.getRelativeUrl(),
 source=person.getRelativeUrl(),
 start_date=start_date,
 specialise_value=sale_trade_condition,
 stop_date=stop_date)
 
 delivery_line = delivery.newContent(
 portal_type="Sale Packing List Line",
 title="%s" % context.getTitle(),
 aggregate_value=context,
 resource_value=service,
 price=0.0,
 quantity_unit=service.getQuantityUnit(),
 quantity=consumed_day_amount
 )
 
 delivery.confirm(comment="Created from %s" % context.getRelativeUrl())
 delivery.start()
 delivery.stop()
 delivery.deliver()
 delivery.startBuilding()
 
 result.append((delivery_line.getRelativeUrl(), delivery.getRelativeUrl()))
 
 return result
